name: ai-code-review-platform
description: Enterprise AI Code Review Bot for GitHub Pull Requests - Hybrid static-analysis + AI reasoning platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd worker-python && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web,worker -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.dev:worker: cd worker-python && ([ -d venv ] || python3 -m venv venv) && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -q -r requirements.txt && python -m src.main
scripts.start: concurrently -n api,web,worker -c blue,green,yellow "npm run start:api" "npm run start:web" "npm run start:worker"
scripts.start:worker: cd worker-python && source venv/bin/activate && python -m src.main
scripts.docker:dev: docker-compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up mongodb redis -d && npm run dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules api-node/node_modules web-nextjs/node_modules shared/node_modules api-node/dist web-nextjs/.next shared/dist
